section.name: About
section.p: This module contains a proof of concept (POC) of Wicket support. It is similar to the JSF tag lib, but tags are defined in the code, keeping the html code clean.

section.name: Features
section.p: Only templating is implemented because this is the most tricky part. Block includes are simple to implement in almost every framework .

tr.td: page is the only attribute supported
name is the only attribute supported
